name: My Haven Horse Racing . Wild Horses Races Game
name_original: My Haven Horse Racing . Wild Horses Races Game
description:
Download the best 2016 horse simulator!

Choose your favourite horse among the available ones!

Perform jumps, gallop and compete at the highest level!

Learn to ride horses and gallop on fashion trails!

Avoid hitting other jockey riders in this very realistic horse simulator game!

Go at full speed and experience the passion for horses in a wild and crazy race!

Recommend it to your friends and compete to see who's the best rider!

Follow us on our social networks to instantly receive access to the best games of the app stores!

Follow us on Twitter: @LabCave
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/LabCaveGames
